subject: heel stop
description_text:
Hi, is it possible to mount this heel stop on my simson plus X pedal set? I have the model with the baseplate. Can I buy it separately? (
photo attachment ) .

Thanks,
Foggia Ivan

conversations.body_text: Hi Ivan Foggia, We currently offer US, EU, and UK power plugs. Please specify the desired type in your order notes. If no note is provided, we will send the US plug by default. Tomorrow, we will confirm the timing for Italy. Usually, UPS and other couriers are used, so the shipping should be relatively fast.

Hi, I just placed the order and specified in the notes. Is everything correct?
Order #SSN1646

Foggia Ivan

________________________________
Da: service@simsonn.com
Hi Ivan Foggia,  Alright, I’ve already informed the warehouse staff to check the order notes, and they will send the appropriate plug accordingly.
Hi，Ivan Foggia，  由于 VAM Pro 外壳表面处理延迟，首批订单预计将于 6 月 16 日至 18 日开始发货。我们将使用国际快递，确保快速送达。

Hi Ivan Foggia,  Due to delays in the surface finishing of the VAM Pro housing, the first batch of orders is expected to begin shipping between June 16th and 18th. International express shipping will be used, ensuring fast delivery.

Hi, is it possible to mount this heel stop on my simson plus X pedal set? I have the model with the baseplate. Can I buy it separately? (

photo attachment ) .

________________________________
Da: service@simsonn.com
ID 号为 159, 326 和 447 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单159  
      主题: Info Vam pro  
      描述:  
Buongiorno, Ho acquistato su Amazon Italia la vostra pedaliera Simsonn PRO Plus X e vorrei acquistare sul vostro sito 2 Simsonn VAM Pro con alimentatore incluso. La spina (EU) è compresa? 
 
Quanto tempo ci vuole per la spedizione in Italia? 
 
 
 
 
Grazie, 
 
Foggia Ivan

合并来自工单326  
      主题: Info  
      描述:   Hi, when will order no. SSN1646 be shipped? I remind you that I need EU plugs.
Thanks,
Foggia Ivan

合并来自工单447  
      主题: Info  
      描述:   Hi, is it possible to mount this heel stop on my simson plus X pedal set? I have the model with the baseplate. Can I buy it separately?

I have also already placed two other orders, when will they be shipped?     n. SSN1730  : White Elastomers        n. SSN1646   : Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor (EU Pluging)        Thanks,  Foggia Ivan
Hi Ivan Foggia,  The PlusX base plate is compatible with the installation of the ProX damping footplate, but the LED light strip is not supported and cannot be lit.

Hi, how can i buy It?



Inviato da Outlook per Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

how can i buy it? i am not interested in led


Inviato da Outlook per Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Is it not possible to buy only the bar with the LED? I already have the base of the Simsonn Plus X.

________________________________
Da: service@simsonn.com
